text:
Now is not the time for Delawareans to get complacent. We face a very serious situation, with additional cases of COVID-19 and hospitalizations statewide. 

That's why starting 8am on Tues, 4/28, Delawareans are required to wear face coverings in public.
ℹ️https://t.co/nCYjojwphq https://t.co/5E2zyHzBSs
